patient_info: Hematuria,Slurred speech,Abnormality of the liver,Dysphagia,Drooling,Abnormal caudate nucleus morphology,Hand tremor,Poor appetite,Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration,Increased urinary copper concentration,Kayser-Fleischer ring
golden_diagnosis: 肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease,肝豆状核变性; 威尔逊氏病/Hepatolenticular degeneration; Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease
predict_diagnosis:
1. Wilson's disease (Wilson disease/Wilson disease/Wilson disease, 肝豆状核变性)
2. Hemolytic uremic syndrome (Hematuria, Slurred speech, Abnormality of the liver, Dysphagia, Drooling, Abnormal caudate nucleus morphology, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration, Kayser-Fleischer ring)
3. Neurodegenerative disorder (Nephroptenia, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration, Kayser-Fleischer ring, Abnormality of the maxillary sinus)
4. Hereditary spherocytosis (Hematuria, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration)
5. Congenital disorder of glycation (CDG) (Hematuria, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration, Kayser-Fleischer ring)
6. Paroxysmal positional vertigo (Dysphagia, Drooling, Hand tremor, Abnormal caudate nucleus morphology, Kayser-Fleischer ring)
7. Acoustic neuroma (Hematuria, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration)
8. Essential thrombocythemia (Hematuria, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration)
9. Lead toxicity (Hematuria, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration)
10. Celiac disease (Hematuria, Hand tremor, Poor appetite, Decreased circulating ceruloplasmin concentration, Increased urinary copper concentration)
